price: Waɗanda malãiku suke karɓar rãyukansu sunã mãsu zãluntar kansu. Sai suka jẽfa nẽman sulhu (suka ce) "Ba mu kasance muna aikata wani mummũnan aiki ba." Kayya! Lalle Allah ne Masani ga abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ ظَالِمِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡۖ فَأَلۡقَوُاْ ٱلسَّلَمَ مَا كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُ مِن سُوٓءِۭۚ بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna tatawaffāhumu al-malāikatu ẓālimī anfusihim fa-alqawū al-salama mā kunnā naʿmalu min sūin balā inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
